com.cse110team24.walkwalkrevolution.firebase.auth

Interface AuthService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AuthServiceSubject, Subject<AuthServiceObserver>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FirebaseAuthAdapter, TestAuth.TestAuthService

    public interface AuthService
extends AuthServiceSubject
    Handles user authentication given the implementing type's provider

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AuthService.AuthError
      Various errors that can occur during authentication

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthService.AuthError getAuthError() 
      IUser getUser() 
      boolean isUserSignedIn() 
      void signIn(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Signs in a user to this service's provider, given email and password.
      void signUp(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String displayName)
      Signs up a user to this service's provider given email, password, and display name and automatically signs the user into the provider.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cse110team24.walkwalkrevolution.firebase.auth.AuthServiceSubject

        notifyObserversSignedIn, notifyObserversSignedUp, notifyObserversSignInError, notifyObserversSignUpError

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cse110team24.walkwalkrevolution.utils.Subject

        deregister, register

    • Method Detail

      • signIn

        void signIn(java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String password)
        Signs in a user to this service's provider, given email and password.

        On success, a call to AuthServiceSubject.notifyObserversSignedIn(IUser) is made with the sign in user.

        On failure, a call to AuthServiceSubject.notifyObserversSignInError(AuthService.AuthError) is made with the AuthError that occurred.

        Parameters:
        email - the existing user's email
        password - the existing user's password

      • signUp

        void signUp(java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String displayName)
        Signs up a user to this service's provider given email, password, and display name and automatically signs the user into the provider.

        On success, a call to AuthServiceSubject.notifyObserversSignedUp(IUser) is made with the sign in user.

        On failure, a call to AuthServiceSubject.notifyObserversSignUpError(AuthService.AuthError) is made with the AuthError that occurred.

        Parameters:
        email - the new user's email
        password - the new user's password
        displayName - the new user's displayName

      • getUser

        IUser getUser()
        Returns:
        the currently signed in user

      • getAuthError

        AuthService.AuthError getAuthError()
        Returns:
        the last AuthError that occurred during sign-in or sign-up

      • isUserSignedIn

        boolean isUserSignedIn()
        Returns:
        true if a user is currently signed in to this service's provider
